query: Garmin Gravel Worlds gravel race Lincoln

videos.title: 2023 Garmin Gravel Worlds Athlete Video
videos.description: Here is your 2023 Garmin Gravel Worlds athlete meeting. We talk about almost everything you need to know to get ready for your experience in Lincoln, Nebraska. If you have any questions, almost everything can be found at www.gravel-worlds.com.
videos.transcript:
I want to thank the entire Lincoln

soon

want to thank

thank you

again we do not have the resources or

um for the start of the the 150 race
similar to last year we are having the

what you think about the time that
you're going to finish line up at those

the 150. that's very important for
safety that makes sure that you're not

at the front that are going to be going

there so
um and then that should be it for race
day lineup behind the arch and have a

next up we're going to talk about rules
we have very few rules but they're very

rule number one always been the rule of
gravel worlds be cool uh it's it's
really simple but it goes a long way so
if you kind of have to ask it's probably
not cool so basically the Golden Rule be
kind to other people other people's
things and you're going to be good to

yelling at volunteers cutting course

videos.title: Garmin Gravel Worlds 2024 - 75 Mile Race - Heat, Hills and a Privateer
videos.description:
Gravel Worlds was hard. First time in a race that I cared less about personal performance and achievements. I just wanted to finish and say I did it. This was the toughest race I’ve ever done. I’ve done Unbound 100 twice, Skinny Tire Festival, Tour De Lakes, and Muleskinner, but for some reason GW - 75 (78 😉) seems a lot difficult. The most I’ve ever climbed in a race. From starting out of the gates hot in the 1st half to bonking during 2nd half, Gravel Worlds threw everything at everyone. That said, what I like about these races is the encouragement from other riders even when they are struggling. It’s truly a big family out there and everyone is there to finish and have fun. So I’ve done the 30 and 75 at Gravel Worlds and will be back again to the 150 next.

- Gravel Wolds Privateer - 75 @gravel_worlds 
- 3,132 Calories burn
- 5,492 feet of climbing
- 6 bottles of water and a water pack. Thanks @polarbottle and @camelbak 
- dozen gels
- One lost bottle
- 200 potholes
- 20 miles of bonking
- Max speed 38 mph
- 1000s of people cheering 📣 us on
- dozens of people creating their own mini support stations to help out the riders
- 3 hours of extreme heat
- the countless amount of hills. Omg 
- got to say hey 👋 to the podcaster I listen to. @jasonstrohbehn @sofiasedona on @gravelfamilypodcast and got a shoutout from them when I finished!!! 
- got 4 points from @garmin connect for completing Privateer 75
- photos capture by my iPhone and Insta360 
- beat the heat
- Canyon Grail AL 7.0 
- 3rd longest ride (personal)
- On to 150 next year 

Bike & Race Gear: 
Canyon Grail Gravel Bike
Garmin 830 Computer
Camelbak
Topeak Multi-Tool
Tubeless Tires
12-Speed
Gels

Photography 
@jrw_shoots 
Insta360X3
iPhone

#gravel #garmin #gravelworlds #lincoln #NEB #NEBRASKA #racing #cycling #canyon #75miles #cyclingclub #green #canyongrailal #rain #weather #Finished #goals #hot #bonking #gravelfamily

videos.title: Garmin Gravel Worlds 150 - 2022 (Full Course)
videos.description: Fantastic and brutal course. Every corner was a sketchy corner. Recap: https://youtu.be/PwB-9eOUwB0

videos.title: 2016 Gravel Worlds: 145+ Miles in Lincoln, Nebraska! Available in 60FPS HD!
videos.description:
Saturday, August 20, 2016. JOM, K-Dogg and Mrs K-Dogg of the Gravel Cyclist crew flew 2 x steel Ritchey Breakaways and 1 x titanium Ritchey Breakaway along with tools, clothing, food and other stuff - to race 145+ miles and over 7,500 feet of climbing at the unofficial World Championships of Gravel - Gravel Worlds in Lincoln, Nebraska! Lincoln, Nebraska ain't flat...

JOM's race report: http://wp.me/p4V4se-39z
JOM's Ritchey Titanium Breakaway CX race bike: http://wp.me/p4V4se-389

Gravel Worlds website: http://gravel-worlds.com

Web: http://GravelCyclist.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/GravelCyclist
Instagram - http://Instagram/GravelCyclist
Twitter - http://twitter.com/GravelCyclist
Vimeo - http://vimeo.com/GravelCyclist

videos.title: Gravel Worlds 2025 - RAW HIGHLIGHTS
videos.description:
Joe Goettl here for his 2nd run at Gravel World's in Lincoln, NE. Last year the heat would be the story, this year it is the mud! Here are all the best raw moments from inside the race from Joe's point of view!

We will have a full, more in-depth Race Recap video to come, covering both Joe's race and Kendra's race's as she took on the Half-Double - 25k run and 77 mile bike!
